function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission risk of COVID-19 in the built environment","Impact":"Disruption of normal life and public health concerns","Mitigation":"Adopting adaptive design measures and maintaining hygiene in every sector","Technologies":"Technological solutions for air filtration and surface disinfection","People":"General public, building occupants, and workers","Owner":"Government, public health authorities, and building owners"}]}
